thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic hotel, wonderful staff
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel, wonderful staff - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: wjs1968
title: Fantastic hotel, wonderful staff
text: I did a lot of research when booking our trip and this hotel did not disappoint. From the moment we checked in to the moment we left , everything was perfect . The hotel is in a great location, we could walk everywhere , the breakfast was wonderful and set us up for the day and the rooms were clean and modern . The thing that made our stay was the truly amazing staff , genuinely friendly and attentive , nothing was too much trouble . We loved Rome and loved the Artemide . Thank you for making our trip so special . We will definitely be back
